Dinotron barely manages to block Aerotaur's staff with his sword. 
"Yah!" he says, "this is more like it!" 
He takes a step back and thrusts his sword at Aerotaur's chest.
(Dinotron is a maximal, by the way. So why are we fighting if we're both 
maximals?)
nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
>
> (Whistler is a Maximal and Aerotaur is neutral)
> ::Aerotaur::
> � � "So you want a duel, eh?" �He twirls his staff over his head and brings 
> it slashing towards Dinotron's right shoulder.
>
